issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: The instance foreign key on volume attachment tables is not indexed resulting in slow lookup when there are many instances.
fields.summary: EC2 volume attachment lookup slow with many instances

comments.body:
Indexes are added for instance foreign keys, "metadata_instances_persistent_volumes_vmid_idx":

{code}
eucalyptus_shared=# \d eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_instances_persistent_volumes
            Table "eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_instances_persistent_volumes"
               Column                |            Type             |    Modifiers     
-------------------------------------+-----------------------------+------------------
 id                                  | character varying(255)      | not null
 creation_timestamp                  | timestamp without time zone | 
 last_update_timestamp               | timestamp without time zone | 
 metadata_perm_uuid                  | character varying(255)      | not null
 version                             | integer                     | 
 metadata_vm_volume_attach_time      | timestamp without time zone | 
 metadata_vm_volume_at_startup       | boolean                     | default false
 metadata_vm_vol_delete_on_terminate | boolean                     | 
 metadata_vm_volume_device           | character varying(255)      | 
 metadata_vm_volume_is_root_device   | boolean                     | default false
 metadata_vm_volume_remote_device    | text                        | default ''::text
 metadata_vm_volume_status           | character varying(255)      | 
 metadata_vm_volume_id               | character varying(255)      | 
 vminstance_id                       | character varying(255)      | not null
Indexes:
    "metadata_instances_persistent_volumes_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (id)
    "uk_muacb67gpe742w0bfxdyk64c5" UNIQUE CONSTRAINT, btree (metadata_perm_uuid)
    "uk_qhck6noa8fca18b72q1hf7vh9" UNIQUE CONSTRAINT, btree (metadata_vm_volume_id)
    "metadata_instances_persistent_volumes_vmid_idx" btree (vminstance_id)
Foreign-key constraints:
    "fk_83iatnsr4sqx1t63y26m32lii" FOREIGN KEY (vminstance_id) REFERENCES eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_instances(id)
{code}

"metadata_instances_volume_attachments_vmid_idx":

{code}
eucalyptus_shared=# \d eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_instances_volume_attachments
            Table "eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_instances_volume_attachments"
               Column                |            Type             |    Modifiers     
-------------------------------------+-----------------------------+------------------
 id                                  | character varying(255)      | not null
 creation_timestamp                  | timestamp without time zone | 
 last_update_timestamp               | timestamp without time zone | 
 metadata_perm_uuid                  | character varying(255)      | not null
 version                             | integer                     | 
 metadata_vm_volume_attach_time      | timestamp without time zone | 
 metadata_vm_volume_at_startup       | boolean                     | default false
 metadata_vm_vol_delete_on_terminate | boolean                     | 
 metadata_vm_volume_device           | character varying(255)      | 
 metadata_vm_volume_is_root_device   | boolean                     | default false
 metadata_vm_volume_remote_device    | text                        | default ''::text
 metadata_vm_volume_status           | character varying(255)      | 
 metadata_vm_volume_id               | character varying(255)      | 
 vminstance_id                       | character varying(255)      | not null
Indexes:
    "metadata_instances_volume_attachments_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (id)
    "uk_6s7wqa7mgpkqgbvuqu5m84qo1" UNIQUE CONSTRAINT, btree (metadata_perm_uuid)
    "uk_82qw6xkyvw1pqkl95f541246c" UNIQUE CONSTRAINT, btree (metadata_vm_volume_id)
    "metadata_instances_volume_attachments_vmid_idx" btree (vminstance_id)
Foreign-key constraints:
    "fk_4lsrg2gqdxyrm0raag9a2999a" FOREIGN KEY (vminstance_id) REFERENCES eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_instances(id)
{code}

Indexes are present on new installs and will be added on upgrade to 4.2.

Fix verified.

Prior to upgrade:


{code:java}
[root@d-23 ~]# psql -p 8777 -h /var/lib/eucalyptus/db/data eucalyptus_shared

eucalyptus_shared=# \d eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_instances_volume_attachments
            Table "eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_instances_volume_attachments"
               Column                |            Type             |    Modifiers     
-------------------------------------+-----------------------------+------------------
 vminstance_id                       | character varying(255)      | not null
 metadata_vm_volume_attach_time      | timestamp without time zone | 
 metadata_vm_volume_at_startup       | boolean                     | default false
 metadata_vm_vol_delete_on_terminate | boolean                     | 
 metadata_vm_volume_device           | character varying(255)      | 
 metadata_vm_volume_is_root_device   | boolean                     | default false
 metadata_vm_volume_remote_device    | text                        | default ''::text
 metadata_vm_volume_status           | character varying(255)      | 
 metadata_vm_volume_id               | character varying(255)      | 
Indexes:
    "uk_82qw6xkyvw1pqkl95f541246c" UNIQUE CONSTRAINT, btree (metadata_vm_volume_id)
Foreign-key constraints:
    "fk_asv6dkk6euw4jh2o9kium31rr" FOREIGN KEY (vminstance_id) REFERENCES eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_instances(id)

eucalyptus_shared=# \d eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_instances_persistent_volumes
            Table "eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_instances_persistent_volumes"
               Column                |            Type             |    Modifiers     
-------------------------------------+-----------------------------+------------------
 vminstance_id                       | character varying(255)      | not null
 metadata_vm_volume_attach_time      | timestamp without time zone | 
 metadata_vm_volume_at_startup       | boolean                     | default false
 metadata_vm_vol_delete_on_terminate | boolean                     | 
 metadata_vm_volume_device           | character varying(255)      | 
 metadata_vm_volume_is_root_device   | boolean                     | default false
 metadata_vm_volume_remote_device    | text                        | default ''::text
 metadata_vm_volume_status           | character varying(255)      | 
 metadata_vm_volume_id               | character varying(255)      | 
Indexes:
    "uk_qhck6noa8fca18b72q1hf7vh9" UNIQUE CONSTRAINT, btree (metadata_vm_volume_id)
Foreign-key constraints:
    "fk_agp17st5diqe7uarhaa0go6w4" FOREIGN KEY (vminstance_id) REFERENCES eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_instances(id)
{code}


After upgrade:


{code:java}
eucalyptus_shared=# \d eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_instances_volume_attachments
            Table "eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_instances_volume_attachments"
               Column                |            Type             |    Modifiers     
-------------------------------------+-----------------------------+------------------
 vminstance_id                       | character varying(255)      | not null
 metadata_vm_volume_attach_time      | timestamp without time zone | 
 metadata_vm_volume_at_startup       | boolean                     | default false
 metadata_vm_vol_delete_on_terminate | boolean                     | 
 metadata_vm_volume_device           | character varying(255)      | 
 metadata_vm_volume_is_root_device   | boolean                     | default false
 metadata_vm_volume_remote_device    | text                        | default ''::text
 metadata_vm_volume_status           | character varying(255)      | 
 metadata_vm_volume_id               | character varying(255)      | 
 id                                  | character varying(255)      | not null
 creation_timestamp                  | timestamp without time zone | 
 last_update_timestamp               | timestamp without time zone | 
 metadata_perm_uuid                  | character varying(255)      | not null
 version                             | integer                     | 
Indexes:
    "uk_6s7wqa7mgpkqgbvuqu5m84qo1" UNIQUE CONSTRAINT, btree (metadata_perm_uuid)
    "uk_82qw6xkyvw1pqkl95f541246c" UNIQUE CONSTRAINT, btree (metadata_vm_volume_id)
    "metadata_instances_volume_attachments_vmid_idx" btree (vminstance_id)
Foreign-key constraints:
    "fk_asv6dkk6euw4jh2o9kium31rr" FOREIGN KEY (vminstance_id) REFERENCES eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_instances(id)

eucalyptus_shared=# \d eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_instances_persistent_volumes
            Table "eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_instances_persistent_volumes"
               Column                |            Type             |    Modifiers     
-------------------------------------+-----------------------------+------------------
 vminstance_id                       | character varying(255)      | not null
 metadata_vm_volume_attach_time      | timestamp without time zone | 
 metadata_vm_volume_at_startup       | boolean                     | default false
 metadata_vm_vol_delete_on_terminate | boolean                     | 
 metadata_vm_volume_device           | character varying(255)      | 
 metadata_vm_volume_is_root_device   | boolean                     | default false
 metadata_vm_volume_remote_device    | text                        | default ''::text
 metadata_vm_volume_status           | character varying(255)      | 
 metadata_vm_volume_id               | character varying(255)      | 
 id                                  | character varying(255)      | not null
 creation_timestamp                  | timestamp without time zone | 
 last_update_timestamp               | timestamp without time zone | 
 metadata_perm_uuid                  | character varying(255)      | not null
 version                             | integer                     | 
Indexes:
    "uk_muacb67gpe742w0bfxdyk64c5" UNIQUE CONSTRAINT, btree (metadata_perm_uuid)
    "uk_qhck6noa8fca18b72q1hf7vh9" UNIQUE CONSTRAINT, btree (metadata_vm_volume_id)
    "metadata_instances_persistent_volumes_vmid_idx" btree (vminstance_id)
Foreign-key constraints:
    "fk_agp17st5diqe7uarhaa0go6w4" FOREIGN KEY (vminstance_id) REFERENCES eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_instances(id)
{code}
